title: Digital Novel Schema
description: A digital novel is a collection of digital content that is intended to be read in a single session or sessions. Digital novels are often published as a single book, but may also be published as a collection of individual books, each of which is a separate digital novel.

title.description: The title of the digital novel.

author.description: The author of the digital novel.

publisher.description: The publisher of the digital novel.

release_date_time.description: The date of publication of the digital novel.

language.description: The language of the digital novel.

synopsis.description: A short description of the digital novel.

cover.description: The URL of the cover image of the digital novel.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the digital novel.

chapters.description: A list of chapters in the digital novel.

items.description: A chapter in the digital novel.
